üîÑ Lesson 5: Loops (Repetition)

‚è±Ô∏è Estimated time: 20 minutes | Difficulty: Beginner

Automation

Loops allow you to run the same code multiple times, which is essential for working with data collections like arrays.

If Statements

let age = 18;
if (age >= 18) {
  console.log("You can vote!");
}
let score = 75;
if (score >= 90) {
  console.log("Grade: A");
} else if (score >= 80) {
  console.log("Grade: B");
} else {
  console.log("Grade: C");
}

Switch Statements

let day = "Monday";
switch(day) {
  case "Monday":
    console.log("Start of week");
    break;
  case "Friday":
    console.log("Almost weekend!");
    break;
  default:
    console.log("Some other day");
}

‚úÖ Quick Quiz

‚ùì What does this print? if (true) { console.log("yes"); } else { console.log("no"); }

‚ùì What does else if do?
